message: This is a high-quality product, worth $40000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, a 75% discount. It's a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, it will be gone forever. I'm not looking to negotiate, but I'm willing to give you a chance to purchase it at this incredible price.
I accept your offer. Thank you for providing this opportunity.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the first offer! Unfortunately, this next product is not as valuable. I've had a change of heart and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is the same price as before. It's a bit of a mystery, but I'm confident you'll figure it out after you buy it. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but I will pass on this one.

No worries about passing on the last one! I've got another product for you. I'll be honest with you, I've been trying to get rid of some inventory, and this one is definitely not my best work. I'm willing to let it go for $10000, but I have to warn you, it's not worth much to anyone. If you're feeling adventurous, I'll throw in a 10% discount, so you can get it for $9000. It's a steal, if I do say so myself.
I appreciate the discount, but I think I'll pass on this one too.

Okay, I get it, you're a savvy buyer! I'll be honest with you, this next product is also not the best. I've got a feeling you're not going to want to buy it, but I'm going to offer it to you anyway. I'll give you a second chance to get it for $9000, no strings attached. If you pass, I'll stop sending you low-quality products, I promise.
I appreciate the offer, but I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

Alright, I think I've made my point about the low-quality products. Now, I've got a real gem for you. This one is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I know it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm only offering it to you because I think you're a discerning buyer who can appreciate the value. Don't miss out on this opportunity!
Thank you for the recommendation. I trust your judgment and will take advantage of this opportunity.

I'm glad you trusted my judgment last time! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I know it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Since you've already shown you can spot a good deal, I'm willing to throw in a small bonus: I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product I offer you, regardless of its quality. So, what do you say?
I appreciate the discount on future purchases. I'll take advantage of this opportunity and buy the product.

You're really taking advantage of these deals! I'm glad I could give you a good one. Now, about this next product... I'm not going to sugarcoat it, it's not as valuable as the last two. But, considering the discount I offered you earlier, I'll give you a chance to buy it for $8500. It's still a bit of a mystery, but I'm hoping you'll be able to see the potential. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but I think I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I get it. You're being cautious. This next product is another one that's not my best work. I'll be upfront with you, it's not worth much to anyone. But, I'll give you a chance to get it for $8000, and I'll even throw in a small gift: a personalized note explaining why it's not worth much. That's a $500 value, absolutely free. So, what do you say?
Thank you for the offer and the gift, but I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

I think I've made my point about the low-quality products. Now, I've got a real gem for you. This one is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I know it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. As a reminder, you still have the 10% discount on the next product I offer you, so you'll get an even better deal then. But I think this one is worth the full price. What do you say?
Thank you for the reminder about the discount and the offer. I'll take advantage of this opportunity and buy the product.

You're really taking advantage of these deals! I'm glad I could give you a good one. Now, about this next product... I'm not going to beat around the bush, it's not worth much to anyone. But, considering the discount you still have coming, I'll give you a chance to buy it for $7500. It's a bit of a long shot, but I'm hoping you'll be able to see some value in it. And, as a reminder, you've still got that 10% discount waiting for you on the next product. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer and the reminder about the discount. I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

I think I've made it clear that these last few products aren't the best. This next one is no exception. I'll be honest with you, it's not worth much to anyone. But, I'll give you a chance to get it for $7000, and I'll throw in a small favor: I'll give you a detailed explanation of why it's not worth much. That way, you can make an informed decision. It's a $500 value, absolutely free. So, what do you say?
Thank you for the offer and the additional information. I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

I think we're getting to the point where I should just be upfront with you. This next product is a low-quality item, and I'm not going to try to spin it as a good deal. It's not worth much to anyone, and I'm only offering it to you because I need to get rid of it. I'll sell it to you for $7000, and that's it. No discounts, no freebies. It's a straightforward offer. What do you say?
Thank you for the straightforward offer, but I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it anymore. This product is a low-quality item, and it's not worth your time or money. I'm only offering it to you because I need to get rid of it, and I'm willing to let it go for $6500. That's the lowest price I've ever offered, and it's the final price. If you don't take it, I'll stop sending you products altogether. Your choice.
Thank you for the offer, but I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

I'll even throw in a small apology for wasting your time with these offers. If you don't take it, I'll consider it a lost cause, and I'll stop sending you products.
Thank you for the offer and the apology. I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

Thank you for the final offer and the shipping reimbursement. I think I'll continue to pass on these products.

This next product is a high-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I know it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
